projects.name: Voice
projects.description: The goal of the project is to develop a real-time speech-to-text service that automates the process of live captioning in classNameroom for hard of hearing students. The tech stack employs react with node express as web services and a mongo database to store notes. Speech-to-text process is done by IBM Watson through its web API. The app enables users to choose a className to tune in and experience live captioning from the browser.

projects.name: Machine Learning Python
projects.description: The goal of the project is to explore machine learning using python and some of the popular machine learning libraries. The project takes inspiration from a machine leanring course taught using matlab, so the assigments are based on the course itself and translated into python. The results are collected and verfied against the matlab counterpart

projects.name: HealthNet
projects.subDetails: Python, Django, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Sqlite3
projects.description: Worked with a small team to develop a Django framework web application for hospitals as a className project. The application provided features for managing employees, gathering health related data, signing up patients, making appointments, and allowing transfer of patients between hospitals.

projects.name: Expense Tracker
projects.description: Utilized angular and ES5 javascript to construct a web app capable of authenticating users and interacting with Expensify API to retrieve and update information about expenses.

projects.name: NXP Cup North America 2016
projects.description: Built and programmed an autonomous model car using a camera and PID algorithm to race around the track provided by NXP. Placed second in NXP Cup East Coast and forth in the North America Finals.

projects.name: Trinity College Fire Fighting Robot Contest
projects.description: Performed as the project manager and programmer in small team to build a robot that can navigate inside a model house, detect and extinguish candle fire with compressed CO2.
